text: Robert Mugabe (1924-2019) was the second president of Zimbabwe. Mugabe may also refer to: *Omugabe or the Mugabe, a title given to kings of Ankole of Uganda ==People with the surname== *Aristide Mugabe (born 1988), Rwandan basketball player *Grace Mugabe (born 1965), second wife of Robert Mugabe *Sally Mugabe (1931–1992), first wife of Robert Mugabe ==People with the given name== *Mugabe Were (1968–2008), Kenyan politician
title: Mugabe (disambiguation)
